name: Bakkal Veysel
description:
Bakkal Veysel

Grocery veysel game is a game where we run a neighborhood grocery store, develop it and try to pay the rent that goes up every day. Take care of the shop, clean it every day, or no customers will come and you will go bankrupt.

+ 2 types customer

+ 5 types product

Controls

"W,A,S,D" movement

"E" ınteraction

"ESC" pause

I Use Softwares

Unity , Asiprite

Source Code

Github
